menu.name: FNF Free Download Port
menu.desc: Change options for the port here!

menu.name: Accessibility
menu.desc: YOU SHOULD PROBABLY LOOK HERE FIRST!!

checkbox.name: Flashing Lights
checkbox.desc: Disable this if you want to turn off flashing lights! (will also disable the intro countdown visuals)

checkbox.name: Color-changing Lights
checkbox.desc: Disable this if you want to turn off color-changing lights!

menu.name: Gameplay
menu.desc: Stuff like botplay, DX strums, etc.

checkbox.name: Botplay
checkbox.desc: Enable this if you just wanna watch the game play itself.

checkbox.name: Free Download DX Strums
checkbox.desc: Enable this if you prefer the way the strums look in FNFFD:DX.

checkbox.name: Show Accuracy
checkbox.desc: Enable this if you want to include accuracy with your song info.

menu.name: Appearance
menu.desc: Stuff like hiding fps, mouse cursor, etc.

checkbox.name: Change FPS
checkbox.desc: Sets the FPS to 40 to be more accurate to the original game.

checkbox.name: Hide FPS Counter
checkbox.desc: Disable this if you want the FPS counter to be visible by default.

checkbox.name: Use System Cursor
checkbox.desc: Enable this to disable the custom cursor.

checkbox.name: Show Intro Splash
checkbox.desc: Disable this if you want to get rid of the "made in codename" intro screen.

checkbox.name: Fullscreen Easter Egg
checkbox.desc: Disable this if you want to be able to fullscreen. It's insanely glitchy though, so be careful!
